title: Baba Qu Na Er Qinzi Baodian
synopsis: The story tells the story of five star parents and children who accepted new challenges and came to the animation planet. Influenced by the earth’s super-popular program "Where is Dad?", a pair of star parents and sons from the animation planet also joined the show. Unexpectedly, he was repeatedly hindered by program groups such as "Where are my mother?" in the animation planet, and the filming location was occupied by fans. The animation planet is completely different from the real world. There are various unimaginable adventures waiting for them, such as underwater villages, fairy tale forests, and snowman kingdoms. In the end, fathers and children overcome difficulties and regain their recognition. (translated from tenceng)
